Action.author: scottz
Action.body: Busy with master release v1.4 these days, but a quick triage shows the network setup seemd ok, the other pte daily tests ran fine, and we simply saw ZERO successful transactions for this testcase. All were failures. Someone may have to run on desktop to gather peer logs for investigation.

Action.author: sambhavdutt
Action.body: This test case has been passing in the daily tests.
